attributes.action: Give the electorate a referendum Final Say on Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Enough is enough. National Interest in paramount. We have few choices and have clear picture where do we want to go. There are consequences if we go for hard Brexit such as industry will be paralysed, jobs will be lost, difficult to travel across Europe and so on.Therefore, we need people's vote based on three options

   Hard Brexit if no deal is done
   Negotiated Brexit
   Stay within EU with controlled immigration
attributes.background: In the last EU referendum, the main factor for leaving was immigration and take control of our own Laws. The country was quite divided with a narrow margin. We don't want the politicians to fight each other anymore.
